msContents.summary: Tax register, recording the daily collection of money taxes in the village of Karanis; the name of each tax-payer paying the poll-tax is cross-referenced with a page of another register, where taxpayers were listed geographically

msItemStruct.note: Due to the size of this tax roll (P.Mich. IV/1, 225 + IV/2, 358), its content has been divided in the present database into several cards (one for each column).
Pub. status: Recto; Verso of col. 129 is blank

supportDesc.support: 1 papyrus ; col. 129-130: 33.2 x 29.2 cm; total size: ***

condition.ab: Col. 129: nearly complete (papyrus cut off left of col. 129 when housed in glass)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Sisois son of Naaraus deuteros and Thaisas grandson of Theabenis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 229)
Phanomgeus son of Tesenouphis and Thaesis grandson of Phanomgeus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245)
Maron son of Satabous and Tkonnos grandson of Maron (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 187)
Kanis son of Anchophis and Tauorsoraipis grandson of Mares (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 180)
Patkonnis son of Mysthes and Taonnophris grandson of Patkonnis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 200)
Herakleides son of Abykis and Herais grandson of Abykis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 167)
Onnophris son of Menches and Thaseis grandson of Onnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)
Onnophris son of Sisois and Thaesis grandson of Petsiris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Petheus son of Sokmenis and Thaesis grandson of Sokmenis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 204)
Kastor son of Petheus and Herakleia grandson of Phanomgeus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 181)
Hatres son of Diodoros apator and of Aphrodous
Agathopous, doulos of Thermoutharion alias Tpaietis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 148)
Dioskoros son of Petheus and Taorsenouphis grandson of Kollouthos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 162)
Dionysios son of Tepheros, apator (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 162)
Valerius son of Valeria, apator (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 195)
Ammonios son of Pasoknopaios and Thatres grandson of Limnaios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 151)
Petheus alias Karanos son of Sokmenis and Tasokmenis grandson of Tasokmenis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 204)
Petaus son of Sisois and Thermouthis grandson of Satabous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 209)
Ptolemaios son of Chairemon and Stotoetis grandson of Horos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: (Col.) 129;;On the 26th (of Pauni):;Sisois, son of Naaraus the second and Thaisas, grandson of Theabenis, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 101;Phanomgeus, son of Tesenouphis and Thaesis, grandson of Phanomgeus, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 3;Maron, son of Satabous and Tkonnos, grandson of Maron, for ch(--): 8 drachmai; column 5;Kanis, son of Anchophis and Tauorsoraipis, grandson of Mares, for (the contribution for) the guards: 28 obols; column 4;Patkonnis, son of Mysthes and Taonnophris, grandson of Patkonnis: 4 drachmai; column 7;Herakleides, son of Abykis and Herais, grandson of Abykis, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 9;Onnophris, son of Menches and Thaseis, grandson of Onnophris: 4 drachmai; column 10;Onnophris, son of Sisois and Thaesis, grandson of Petsiris, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 12;Petheus, son of Sokmenis and Thaesis, grandson of Sokmenis: 4 drachmai; (and) for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 17;Kastor, son of Petheus and Herakleia, grandson of Phanomgeus, for ch(--): 8 drachmai; column 21;Hatres, son of Diodoros who is of unknown father, and of Aphrodous: 8 drachmai; column 21;Agathopous, slave of Thermoutharion also called Tpaietis, for ch(--): 28 obols; column 21;Dioskoros, son of Petheus and Taorsenouphis, grandson of Kollouthos, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 27;Dionysis, of unknown father, his mother being Tepheros, for ch(--): 28 obols; column 28;Valerius, of unknown father, his mother being Valeria: 4 drachmai; (and) for ch(--): 28 obols; column 29;Ammonis, son of Pasoknopaios and Thatres, grandson of Limnaios, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 29;Petheus also called Karanos, son of Sokmenis and Tasokmenis, grandson of Tasokmenis, for ch(--): 8 drachmai; column 32;Petaus, son of Sisois and Thermouthis, grandson of Satabous, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 34;Ptolemaios, son of Chairemon and Stotoetis, grandson of Horos: 4 drachmai; column 42;Total for the day: 96 drachmai 25 obols.
